name: ArmourFlex® Craftsman Joinery Varnish/Lacquer ACNG2.5
description: ArmourFlex® Craftsman Joinery Varnish/Lacquer ACNG2.5 is a professional, joinery grade, high performance coating utilizing the latest technology in self cross-linking resins coupled with ceramic particles for greater strength & protection. This product provides long lasting protection for wooden: doors, furniture, stairs & spindles and floors. Perfect for heavy domestic, light commercial areas. Available in a natural tone with minimal wood color change and an enriched tone which emphasizes the grain of the wood. This product is available in Matt, Satin & Gloss finishes.
company_name: J V Barrett And Co Ltd
